The duration participation study approximately 12 day include screen visit . This study require 1 clinic confinement 5 days/4 night follow 1 outpatient follow-up visit . A screening visit require within 30 day prior start study . This research study open label study . The study involve single oral dose 18 mg LY2216684 give 2 tablet .
